stories.title: Billionaires-in-space critics are 'largely right', Bezos concedes

stories.text:
Today I have launched GetPress (https://www.producthunt.com/posts/get-press) on ProductHunt.

Despite having more upvotes and activity my product wasn't listed in the popular tab on today's homepage but in the newest tab. I reached out to their support chat and outlined the issue and within minutes they fixed it. Now GetPress is on today's popular homepage.

However, a great deal of time was wasted due to this issue. Appreciate any support on ProductHunt

https://www.producthunt.com/posts/get-press
stories.title: Reached out to PH support and got listed on Homepage
Northern's ticket machines hit by ransomware cyber attack
Stranded and shattered seafarers threaten global supply lines
First ever Extreme Weather warning isued in UK as temperatures seen reaching 33C
Ultralist – open-source task management system for the command line

stories.text:
It seems nobody pays attention to 1 point news here and news from the main page are initially upvoted by bots (to get to there). So I've written a short userscript for this site to highlight all "1 point" entries:

    [...document.querySelectorAll(".score")].filter(x => x.innerText == "1 point").map(x => x.closest("tr").previousSibling.querySelector(".storylink")).forEach(x => x.style.backgroundColor = "#FF9")
stories.title: Show HN: Highlight all “1 point” news
